title: To Ride a Púca
description: Invaders are coming to take what isn't theirs, again.Neala wants to stand and fight for her homeland, but as one of the last druids in ancient Ireland, she may be standing alone.Persecuted, hunted down, forced to live in obscurity, the druids have all but given up. Can the determination of a girl who has barely come into her power bring them together? Or, just when she finally finds her place among her kind, will they end up losing a homeland their very magic is tied to?This unflinching tale of the end of the time of the druids is filled with hardship, discovery, and love found in the most unexpected of places.
author: Heather McCorkle
